title: 【临时工搬运】中世纪房屋-Medieval Mondays #1: Large House
author: 筒子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 __Tong__ 于 2015-4-16 09:30 编辑 

Medieval Mondays #1: Large House中世纪房屋
[paper]作者原话[paper]

Hey guys, I'm back with another small medieval build - the first one in a hopefully long and successful series: Medieval Mondays. This doesn't mean that every Monday there's gonna be a new medieval build, but that every Monday if you refresh your page it is possible that you might find a new one. So that's that, it's not a regular or weekly series. 

I originally wanted to create my own medieval building pack / bundle, however I quit and picked up the project several times, so I figured it'd probably be the best solution to just, as soon as I'd built another house, upload it here. Otherwise I presumably wouldn't have finished the project and all the work would've been in vain. 

All right, the buildings I'd like to cover in this series are the following: 

- Large houses 
- Normal houses 
- Small houses 
- Church 
- Castle 
- Town hall 
- Market place 
- Training area 
- Windmill 
- Forge 
- Watchtower / Clocktower 
- Graveyard 
- Gate 
- Town walls 
- Library 

These are some ideas I've had - if you have any additions you'd like to see please tell me! I will very likely add them to the list :) 

Interiors won't constantly be a part of the builds, but some of them will surely be furnished. So you see, it's really just a fun series. Don't forget to diamond, favourite & subscribe, and see you next time :D 
[book]简单翻译[book]这个上面说的大致意思是作者想要发布一系列的中世纪建筑，这次是第一个建筑-房屋下面的还没有发布的建筑列表
下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]这个作者的实力不需要怀疑，他所做的中世纪房屋简单但是有内容很好的利用了半砖和台阶，颜色搭配也非常的舒服给人感觉就是建筑虽然小，但是有很多的内容[painting]图片欣赏[painting]

[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*

更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找
